name: Whack!
description:
Welcome to the Whack! Agency. Here at Whack!, we specialise in eliminating particular individuals on a contract basis. We employ only the most skillful assassins the world has to offer, and then we offer them a little more. What does Whack! have that other agencies of this nature do not?

We train our assassins in the complex art of 'controlled power-falling'.

Hello everybody! Kirkwall here with another one of my University projects, probably one of the most technical of all my projects - which is rare for me! My coding skills are slowly getting better so hopefully my future projects will stay this advanced, but no promises ;) A lot of time poured into this one guys - enjoy.

As always,

Absolutely, 100% non-profit.
